titles.title: A concurrent resolution designating the month of April 2005 as "American Religious History Month".
A concurrent resolution designating the month of April 2005 as "American Religious History Month".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: Designates the month of April 2005 as American Religious History Month. Requests that the President issue a proclamation calling upon the people of the United States to observe the year [sic] with appropriate ceremonies and activities.
